常.definition: always; ever; often; frequently; common; general; constant

常任理事國.definition: permanent member state (of the UN Security Council)

常住.definition: long-term resident; permanent residence; eternalism (permanence of soul, Sanskrit Sassatavada)

常來常往.definition: to visit frequently; to have frequent dealings (with); to see each other often

常務.definition: routine; everyday business; daily operation (of a company)

常務委員會.definition: standing committee (e.g. of National People's Congress)

常勝軍.definition: Ever Victorious Army (1860-1864), Qing dynasty army equipped and trained jointly with Europeans and used esp. against the Taiping rebels

常在河邊走，哪有不濕鞋.pinyin: chang2 zai4 he2 bian1 zou3 , na3 you3 bu4 shi1 xie2
常在河邊走，哪有不濕鞋.definition: a person who regularly walks by the river cannot avoid getting their shoes wet (proverb); (fig.) it comes with the territory (e.g. a person with the power to grant favors will inevitably succumb to temptation and take a bribe)

常委.definition: standing committee (abbr. for 常務委員會|常务委员会[chang2wu4 wei3yuan2hui4]); member of the standing committee (abbr. for 常務委員|常务委员[chang2wu4 wei3yuan2])

常客.definition: frequent visitor; fig. sth that crops up frequently

常寧.definition: see 常寧市|常宁市[Chang2ning2 Shi4]

常寧市.definition: Changning, county-level city in Hengyang 衡陽市|衡阳市[Heng2yang2 Shi4], Hunan

常山.definition: Changshan county in Quzhou 衢州[Qu2 zhou1], Zhejiang

常山縣.definition: Changshan county in Quzhou 衢州[Qu2 zhou1], Zhejiang

常州市.definition: Changzhou, prefecture-level city in Jiangsu Province 江蘇省|江苏省[Jiang1su1 Sheng3]

常年.definition: all year round; for years on end; average year

常年累月.definition: variant of 長年累月|长年累月[chang2 nian2 lei3 yue4]

常德市.definition: Changde, prefecture-level city in Hunan Province 湖南省[Hu2nan2 Sheng3]

常德絲弦.definition: Changde sixian, theatrical folk music style with singing in Changde dialect accompanied by traditional string instruments

常情.definition: common sense; the way people usually feel about things

常態分班.definition: (Tw) grouping of students into classes of mixed ability

常態化.definition: (statistics) normalized; to normalize (relations etc); to become the norm

常態編班.definition: see 常態分班|常态分班[chang2 tai4 fen1 ban1]

常熟市.definition: Changshu, county-level city in Suzhou 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1zhou1 Shi4], Jiangsu

常理.definition: common sense; conventional reasoning and morals

常用品.definition: everyday implement; object of everyday use

常衡制.definition: Avoirdupois Weight, a system of weights based on the 16-ounce pound (or 7,000 grains)

常見.definition: commonly seen; common; to see sth frequently

常規.definition: code of conduct; conventions; common practice; routine (medical procedure etc)

常言說得好.definition: as the saying goes; as they say...

常設.definition: (of an organization etc) standing or permanent

常識.definition: common sense; general knowledge; CL:門|门[men2]

常道.definition: normal and proper practice; conventional practice; common occurrence
